import {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; export default function NavBar() { document.body.setAttribute("dir","rtl") let [isMenuClicked, setIsMenuClicked] = useState(false) function handleClick() { setIsMenuClicked(!isMenuClicked) } // Changes here let [colors, setcolors] = useState(false) function cc() { setcolors(pre => !pre) } useEffect(() => { document.body.classList.toggle("white-theme-variables") }, [colors]) return (
